name: PositronX
description: PositronX is a futuristic rogue-lite FPS filled with randomly generated levels, items, and enemies; fast-paced combat; creative movement and time control mechanics with breathtaking visuals. Each playthrough gives you a unique experience every time you play this game. Play. Die. Repeat.
minimum_requirements: 最低配備: 需要 64 位元的處理器及作業系統 作業系統: Win7+ 處理器: I5 2.4 ghz or similar 記憶體: 8 GB 記憶體 顯示卡: GForce 660 GTX or AMD similar DirectX: 版本：11 儲存空間: 8 GB 可用空間 音效卡: Any Sound Card with 3D support 備註: The game has been tested to run on Intel GPUs as well but for a decent experience use a dedicated known video card
recommended_requirements: 建議配備: 需要 64 位元的處理器及作業系統 作業系統: Win7+ 處理器: I7 3.4 ghz 記憶體: 8 GB 記憶體 顯示卡: GForce 770 GTX or AMD similar DirectX: 版本：11 儲存空間: 8 GB 可用空間 音效卡: Any Sound Card with 3D support
